comments:
Please open the attached sample report.

There are two errors appears:
1.Switch to XML source of the report, model indicate a semantic error:
"The property "queryTimeOut" in the element "ODA Data Set("Data Set")" is not defined"

2.Double click the data set to pop up the dataset edit dialog, select the "Property Binding", a NPE thrown. Error log:
